text: Xinfeng tian jing de ren, qingqiu ni cong tianshang jiang shi tamen yi bu jingdian. Tamen que yi xiang mu sa qingqiuguo bi zhe geng zhongda de shi, tamen shuo:“Ni shi women qinyan kanjian an la ba.” Ji lei yin tamen de bu yi er xiji tamen. Zai xuduo mingzheng jianglin tamen zhihou, tamen you ren du wei shen, dan wo yi shu rao zhe shi. Wo ceng shangci mu sa yige mingxian de zhengju
